name: Switcheroo Sidekicks
description:
Title: Switcheroo Sidekicks

Description:

Switcheroo Sidekicks is a fast-paced two-player game where you and a friend take on the roles of heroic sidekicks. But there's a twist: you must switch roles with your teammate mid-game to stay alive!

At the start of each round, only one player's character will be able to move and attack while the other player's character is frozen. To switch roles, simply press the "E" key on your keyboard. But be careful: your opponent will be waiting for the right moment to strike!

The goal of the game is to defeat your opponent's sidekick before they defeat yours. Each character has unique abilities and stats, so choose your sidekick wisely and adapt to your opponent's strategy.

With colorful 2D graphics, intuitive controls, and addictive gameplay, Switcheroo Sidekicks is the perfect game to play with a friend. Are you ready to switch things up and become the ultimate sidekick?
